userStoryRepliesDataMapping.description: Complete list of story replies the authenticated user has sent on Instagram
userStoryRepliesDataMapping.criticalInsight: Every story reply in this response represents a message the user actively sent to story creators

dataLocation.responseStructure: GraphQL response containing user's story replies array
dataLocation.dataType: Array of user story reply objects
dataLocation.context: This data is only available when user navigates to their activity/story_replies page

userDataPoints.description: Array containing all story replies the user has sent

dataStructure.itemStructure: Each item represents one story reply the user sent

reply_id.description: Unique identifier of the user's story reply
reply_id.context: Track specific story replies user sent

reply_text.description: The message USER SENT to story creator
reply_text.context: USER'S OWN WORDS - reveals interests and communication style

reply_type.context: Shows how user engages with stories

story_replied_to.context: Shows what type of stories trigger user engagement

story_creator.context: Shows which creators user actively messages

story_content.context: Context of what prompted user's reply

conversation_thread.context: Shows ongoing conversations from story replies

media_shared.description: If user shared media in reply
media_shared.context: Shows if user shares content in replies

userDataPoints.userContext: Each item is a story reply USER ACTIVELY SENT

userDataPoints.description: Total number of story replies user has sent
Information for loading more story replies

dataStructure.end_cursor: Token to fetch next batch of story replies

userDataPoints.context: User may have many story replies requiring pagination

usageContext.dataAvailability: Only accessible when user is logged in and visits their activity page
usageContext.updateFrequency: List updates in real-time as user sends new story replies
usageContext.privacyNote: This is private user activity showing direct messages to story creators
usageContext.analyticsValue: Reveals user's interests, creators they engage with, and communication patterns

exampleQuery.description: How to identify and extract user story replies
steps: 4. Each item = one story reply user sent
5. Extract reply text, creator info, and story context for analysis
